Package Database

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
Database.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
This class is the SQL connection to the appointments table that does the data CRUD stuff.

    • createAppointment

      public static boolean createAppointment(String contactName, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Integer customerId, Integer userID) throws SQLException
      This method creates a new Appointment in the database with the information from the user input.
      Parameters:
      contactName - String value of Appointment Contact Name
      title - String value of Appointment Title
      description - String value of Appointment Description
      location - String value of Appointment Location
      type - String value of Appointment Type
      start - LocalDateTime value of Appointment Start
      end - LocalDateTime value of Appointment End
      customerId - Int value of Customer ID
      userID - Int value of User ID
      Returns:
      Returns Boolean true if the appointment was successfully created and false if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Catches SQLException, prints stacktrace, and error message for debugging.

      Returns:
